actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to permit the Cow Creek Band of the Umpqua Tribe of Indians to file with the United States Court of Claims any claim such band could have filed with the Indian Claims Commission under the Act of August 13, 1946 (60 Stat. 1049).

summary.text: Grants the Court of Claims jurisdiction to consider any claim filed by the Cow Creek Band of the Umpqua Tribe of Indians of Oregon within five years after the enactment of this Act respecting any matter for which a claim could have been filed by such band with the Indian Claims Commission, notwithstanding the time limitations on such claims.

titles.title: A bill to permit the Cow Creek Band of the Umpqua Tribe of Indians to file with the United States Court of Claims any claim such band could have filed with the Indian Claims Commission under the Act of August 13, 1946 (60 Stat. 1049).
